with <u>H. bolina <\u> a form of very wide 
range and subject to great variation 
which affects it sometimes locally 
sometimes individually.
Col. Swinhoe has not attempted in any way to the reduce the genus 
& species to systematic order & in
consequence he uses the terms “species”
& “subgroup” in a very vague and 
sometimes inconsistent <s>man<\u> sense.
It seems to me that a careful 
revision <s>that <\s> of the extent of the variation 
of these forms & their relationship to
